text: Theodorus "Theo" Johannes Maria van Els (14 May 1936 â€“ 4 August 2015)Family notices in NRC Handelsblad, 6 August 2015. was a Dutch academic. He was born in Wanssum. He served as Rector magnificus of the Radboud University Nijmegen between 1994 and 2000. He was a professor of applied linguistics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch academics Category:Linguists Category:People from Limburg (Netherlands)
title: Theo van Els
